name: organism-interaction
title: OrganismInteraction
description: Events in which interactions between dwc:Organisms were recorded.

fields.name: organismInteractionID
fields.description: An identifier for an instance of a dwc:Event that is an OrganismInteraction.

fields.name: subjectOccurrenceID
fields.description: A unique identifier for the subject dwc:Occurrence in an OrganismInteraction.

fields.name: subjectOrganismPart
fields.description: A part of a subject dwc:Organism involved in an OrganismInteraction.

fields.name: organismInteractionType
fields.description: The category that best matches the nature of an OrganismInteraction.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: organismInteractionTypeIRI
fields.description: The IRI of the controlled vocabulary value for the type of OrganismInteraction.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.

fields.name: organismInteractionTypeVocabulary
fields.description: The reference to the controlled vocabulary where the definitions of values for organismInteractionType are given.

fields.name: objectOccurrenceID
fields.description: A unique identifier for the object dwc:Occurrence in an OrganismInteraction.

fields.name: objectOrganismPart
fields.description: A part of a object dwc:Organism involved in an OrganismInteraction.
